scripts.benchmark: cd benchmark && npm install && node index.js
scripts.benchmark:parse: cd benchmark && npm install && node index.js --parse
scripts.benchmark:stringify: cd benchmark && npm install && node index.js --stringify
scripts.benchmark:baseline: cd benchmark && npm install && node index.js --save-baseline
scripts.benchmark:compare: cd benchmark && npm install && node index.js --baseline baseline.json
scripts.benchmark:stress: cd benchmark && npm install && STRESS_TEST=1 node index.js
